gameDetails.name: Dominion: Summon Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
A new promo card for Dominion releasing in 2015. This card was first used in the Dominion GenCon Tournament finals.

This new Event card has the text:




    
         Summon (Event - Cost 5 [coin])

    
    
        Gain an Action card costing up to 4 [coin]. Set it aside. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, play it.

    


Part of the Dominion series.
